DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective medical charts and medical imaging files review of patients suffering from lacrimal fossa lesions who underwent ocular ultrasonography with color flow doppler imaging.
DOC.brief_title: Colour Doppler Flow Imaging in Lacrimal Gland Lesions
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from lacrimal fossa tumor Orbital ultrasonography performed, including doppler flow imaging Histopathological characterization of the tumor obtained after surgical removal Absence of histopathological characterization Absence of documented ultrasound doppler flow imaging
